title: Mobile Fighter G Gundam
synopsis: In the year Future Century 0060, the many countries that once comprised Earth's surface exist as separate colonies floating in space. Their home planet now uninhabitable, the ruler of all of the colonies is decided by their unanimous participation in the intergalactic Gundam Fight Tournamentâ€”a series of battles between the champions of each colony to determine who is most fit to reign over them all.
